io

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.Factory

  • public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract factory that creates instances of actor types like objects, stations and their queues
    Version:
    2017-10-29
    Author:
    Jaeger, Schmidt
